sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PwdAjaxPublicEnrollEmail</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Public server side AJAX script that sends the details of the subscription or email from the profile.</description>
        <name>PwdAjaxPublicEnrollEmail</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PwdAjaxPublicEnrollEmail = Class.create();
PwdAjaxPublicEnrollEmail.prototype = Object.extendsObject(PwdAjaxEnrollEmail, {
	
	// Let's make this one public.
	isPublic : function() {
		return true;
	},
	
	// return details of a users subscription
	// or email address from his/her profile
	getEmailVerificationInfo:function() {
		// check the security before anything else.
		// If any violation is found, then just return.
		
		if (!this._validateSecurity())
			return;

		// call the method in the parent.
		this.getVerificationInfo();
	},
	
	type: 'PwdAjaxPublicEnrollEmail'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-07-23 02:39:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>002c56760b400300572a6f3ef6673a20</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PwdAjaxPublicEnrollEmail</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Password Reset" source="com.glideapp.password_reset">a54385836da620100acb70b3534330a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_002c56760b400300572a6f3ef6673a20</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-07-24 21:04:43</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>584</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
